name: Animal Shelter (itch)
description:
When thinking back about 2020, not many positive things come up. We faced new difficulties and had to overcome them. Many of our everyday activities were moved to the online world. We see the world of gaming as a place of refuge, where all of us can hide and forget about our problems, at least for a while.

Animal Shelter is meant to be one of such safe places and you are more than welcome to join it.
